tswitem.name: Signet of Deflection
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Deflection
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you are hit by a target who is more than 12 metres away from you, you gain a beneficial effect which reduces the damage you take by 3%/6%/9% for 3 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
